title: "Indicators for publications"
toc: false
---

*Note: Although you can click the checkboxes, this does not have any effect. The checkboxes are only for visualization purposes. The actual app can be found [here](https://resque-framework.github.io/collector-app/).*

```{=html}
<iframe title="Indicators for publications" src="https://resque-framework.github.io/collector-app/preview?type=pubs" width="100%" height="5000px"></iframe>

<!-- Dynamically adjust the height of the embedded iFrame
(the size is sent by the embedded iFrame) -->
<script>
  window.addEventListener('message', function(event) {
    var iframe = document.getElementById('dynamic-iframe');
    iframe.style.height = event.data + 'px';
  });
</script>
```
